text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Please, no. He's inept, cruel, all about his ego & told 16,000 lies, doesn't even realize it= pathological liar! His slow response to COVID-19 has cost MANY DEATHS & infections! A man DIED due to Don's feelings about a med! No, no, no. Wisconsin vote BLUE & Flip the Senate.
